vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.16.3;
son of: Heber (H2268);
brother of: Shomer (H7763H), Hotham (H2369) and Shua (H7774);
father of: Pasach (H6457), Bimhal (H1118) and Ashvath (H6220)
Also named: yaph.le.ti (יַפְלֵטִי "Japhletite" H3311)
§ Japhlet = "he will deliver"
a descendant of Asher through Beriah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Héber; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅弗勒 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他要拯救"
亞設後裔 (代上 7:32,33)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅弗勒 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他要拯救"
亚设后裔 (代上 7:32,33)
